Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a short stay in Singapore”

Reviews.Content: read reviews tripadvisor slightly concerned staying kings copthorne negative reviews proved misguided stay excellent staff extremely friendly helpful particularly check wait ready flight uk offered bottles water quiet seat business centre whilst prepared staff helpful standard twin perfectly clean maintained serviced day bathroom clean towels changed daily slight disappointment water pressure shower minor concern food excellent value considering singapore expensive location hop onoff tour bus stopped outside hotel disappointment breakfast expensive catered mainly asian tastes expect eggs cereal fruit toast available hesitate stay hotel
